content: अपगत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Gone away, departed, passed away, gone off; being remote; <ab>oft.</ab> as first member of <ab>comp.</ab> in the sense of ‘free from’, ‘devoid of’; °अन्यव्यापाराः <ls>K. 43</ls> having no other duties; °मत्सर <ls n="K.">45</ls>; <ls n="K.">47</ls>, <ls n="K.">157</ls>, <ls n="K.">164</ls>, <ls n="K.">207</ls>, <ls n="K.">211</ls>; °निमेषेण चक्षुषा <ls n="K.">154</ls> devoid of twinkling or winking; °मले मनसि <ls n="K.">102.</ls> {@--2@} Dead, deceased.
